Sure, here is a summary of your experience and achievements, including the last two projects, that can be used to create a two-page resume:

[Full Name]
[Contact Information]

Summary:
Innovative and results-driven VP R&D with over 10 years of experience in leading software and hardware development teams. Proven track record in managing complex projects, designing innovative solutions, and delivering high-quality products. Expertise in system architecture, simulation, and data analysis. Exceptional problem-solving and communication skills.

Professional Experience:

VP R&D, [Company Name], [Dates]

* Led a team of 50 engineers and managed the development of multiple software and hardware products from ideation to commercial release
* Designed and implemented the company's technology roadmap, resulting in a 30% increase in revenue and a 25% reduction in development costs
* Established agile development methodologies, leading to a 40% improvement in team productivity and a 20% reduction in time to market

Freelance Senior System Engineer and Architect, [Client Name], [Dates]

* Led the preliminary and critical design reviews for software simulation project for RAFAEL, resulting in successful product delivery on-time and within budget
* Designed and developed the digital architecture and concept of optimizing the recruiting process and collaborating data and analyzing multi-sensors for Israel Air Force, resulting in a more efficient and effective training process
* Collaborated with stakeholders to ensure project requirements were met and identified potential technical risks and issues, proactively addressing them to minimize project delays

CTO, [Company Name], [Dates]

* Established the company's technology vision and developed the product roadmap, resulting in the launch of several successful products
* Built and managed a team of 30 engineers, establishing a culture of innovation, collaboration, and accountability
* Introduced agile methodologies and best practices, leading to a 50% increase in team productivity and a 30% reduction in development costs

Education:

* B.Sc. in Computer Science, [University Name], [Graduation Date]
* M.Sc. in Electrical Engineering, [University Name], [Graduation Date]

Skills:

* System architecture and design
* Data analysis and visualization
* Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
* Project management
* Technical leadership
* Software development (C/C++, Python, Java)
* Hardware design (PCB, FPGA)
* Machine learning and AI

Certifications:

* PMP (Project Management Professional)
* Agile Certified Practitioner (ACP)
* AWS Certified Solutions Architect

References available upon request.

I hope this summary helps you create a strong and effective two-page resume. Good luck with your job search!
